thread.title: Kid Rock Could Be The “Billy Joel At MSG” Of Little Caesars Arena
thread.title_full: Kid Rock Could Be The “Billy Joel At MSG” Of Little Caesars Arena

author: Stereogum
title: Kid Rock Could Be The “Billy Joel At MSG” Of Little Caesars Arena

organizations.name: little caesars arena little caesars arena

text: Little Caesars Arena, Detroit's new entertainment and sports complex and the future home of the Red Wings and the Pistons, is opening in September. And, as Crain's Detroit Business reports, it'll be christened with four shows by hometown "hero," vocal Trump supporter , and renowned glass dildo collector Kid Rock. More »
